articles.title: Can't Deal With Your Phone's Tiny Keyboard? You Need This Game-Changing $30 Tech Purchase
articles.author: Haley Zovickian
articles.summary: Logitech introduces a portable Bluetooth keyboard designed to transform phones and tablets into mini laptops. Reviewers praise its convenience, multi-device connectivity, and integrated cradle for holding devices. The keyboard aims to provide a more comfortable and efficient typing experience on the go, with users highlighting its ease of use and long battery life.

articles.title: BREAKING: Former Top 100 Prospect EXITS Oklahoma
articles.summary: WeAreIowa requires the WeAreIowa app for streaming on phones.

articles.title: How To Make Kraft Mac And Cheese Taste Just How You Remember It
articles.author: Lauren Bair
articles.summary: Kraft Mac and Cheese has introduced new flavors like Everything Bagel, Ranch, and Jalapeño in microwaveable cups. Additionally, Kraft Mac and Cheese ice cream has been launched. These new products target Gen Alpha and future generations.

articles.title: 3 Times Businesses Completely Messed Up
articles.summary: Coca-Cola introduced 'New Coke' to compete with Pepsi but faced customer backlash and reverted to the original formula. Dyson launched the 'Airblade Tap,' a hand washing and drying machine, which was innovative but impractical and messy. Google introduced 'Google Glass,' smart glasses, but they were unpopular due to privacy concerns, high cost, and bulkiness.

articles.title: BOMBSHELL: Sixers Face TOUGH DECISIONS on Yabusele and Grimes
articles.summary: WeAreIowa enables users to stream their content on phones. Users need to install the WeAreIowa app to stream WeAreIowa.

articles.title: Dubai to introduce robot delivery system soon
articles.summary: Yango Technologies is launching a robot grocery delivery service in Dubai. The delivery robots, with a 60-liter capacity, can navigate obstacles and deliver within a 2 km radius in under 30 minutes. This service launches in partnership with Roots Food Group and Dubai's Roads and Transport Authority (RTA).

articles.title: Google will stop supporting early Nest thermostats on October 25
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Google will end software support for first and second-generation Nest Learning Thermostats starting October 25. Google will also cease launching new Nest products in Europe.

articles.title: There Are Scratch and Sniff Armpits on NYC Sidewalks
articles.author: Sammi Caramela
articles.summary: Billie, a personal care brand, launched a marketing campaign in New York City featuring scratch-and-sniff posters of armpits to promote their all-day deodorant. The deodorant offers 24-hour odor protection, is aluminum-free, baking soda-free, dermatologist-tested, and comes in five scents: Cotton Cloud, Santal Blossom, Coco Villa, Lavender Milk, and Tidal Rose.

articles.title: Infinix Note 50:PremiumFeelWithout the Premium Price
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Infinix is promoting the Infinix Note 50. The product promises a premium lifestyle experience and premium products at an affordable price.

articles.title: NSFWLover Unveils the Game-Changing NSFW AI Image Generator
articles.summary: NSFWLover has launched the NSFW AI Image Generator, a tool designed to allow users to easily create custom AI characters and artwork by simply describing a concept in text form and choosing a visual style.  It caters to both beginners and advanced creators with dual-mode functionality and is part of NSFWLover's suite of AI-driven tools.

articles.title: Size does matter: The giant capsule that will take care of all your laundry
articles.author: RONIT MATHIAS
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble, under its Ariel brand, is launching Ariel The Big One laundry capsules in Israel. These capsules are designed for larger laundry loads, removing twice as many stains and odors. A pack of 15 capsules costs NIS 27, while a bag of 25 capsules costs NIS 45.

articles.title: Is the Xpeng G6 a new electric SUV that'll make waves?
articles.summary: Xpeng has introduced the G6, an electric SUV designed to compete with models like the Tesla Model Y and Kia EV6. The G6 is available in Standard and Long Range configurations, offering ranges of 270 and 354 miles, respectively, and features a super-fast charging speed of 280kW.

articles.title: Barilla Pasta Seems Created A Weird Spotify Feature To Help You Cook It Perfectly. – ‘Just a cool fun fact.'
articles.author: Ben Auxier
articles.summary: Barilla has launched a new service: Spotify playlists tailored to the cooking time of each of its pasta types. These playlists are designed to play for the exact duration needed to cook the pasta al dente, providing a timed cooking guide.

articles.title: I use this controller on every platform because of its amazing price and cutting-edge features
articles.author: Saeed Wazir
articles.summary: GameSir has launched the Super Nova, a multi-platform controller compatible with PC, Android, iOS, and Nintendo Switch, priced at $50. The controller features Hall Effect sticks, customizable triggers, rear paddles, and comes with a charging stand and magnetic faceplates. It connects via Bluetooth, 2.4GHz wireless, or USB-C and is available on Amazon and the GameSir site.

articles.title: Dodge tariffs—this phone upgrade is only $90
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: The NanoPhone, a mini Android smartphone, is available for $89.97 with free shipping. It supports 4G LTE, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth, and dual SIM cards, and runs Android 10, offering access to apps like Spotify, TikTok, and Instagram. It features 64GB storage and 4GB RAM.

articles.title: Here's How Nike's New SNKRS Link Experience Works
articles.author: Victor Deng
articles.summary: Nike is launching SNKRS Link through the SNKRS app. This new release experience is designed to give fans a better chance to purchase coveted shoes. The goal of SNKRS Link is to ensure that coveted sneaker releases end up in the hands of "true fans."

articles.title: All the best Dyson beauty dupes we've tested
articles.author: Bethany Allard
articles.summary: The Shark FlexStyle is presented as a multi-styler, delivering a near-identical experience to the Dyson Airwrap at a lower price point. It features a hinge in the base allowing for vertical or L-shape styling, and includes a diffuser attachment.

articles.title: I tried L'Oreal's at-home hair dyeing tool and saved hundreds of dollars at the hair salon
articles.author: Rachel Quigley
articles.summary: L'Oréal has launched Colorsonic, a new high-tech hair-dyeing device designed for at-home use. Colorsonic promises to make hair dyeing as easy as combing hair and includes color cartridges available in 20 shades. The device aims to provide full root coverage in 35 minutes, offering a convenient and cost-effective alternative to salon visits.

articles.title: New Balance's Next Dad Shoe Looks So Technical, They Added 'Utility' to the Name
articles.author: Jack Seemer
articles.summary: New Balance is launching the 1906 Utility shoe, a new model bridging heritage and performance. The shoe incorporates Abzorb cushioning technology and N-ergy shock absorption, utilizing design elements from the 90s and 2000s.

articles.title: Give your old memories a second life with this Kodak scanner, now 20% off
articles.author: Popular Science
articles.summary: Kodak is introducing the Slide N Scan, a device that converts film negatives and slides into digital photos. This enables users to share, save, and relive old memories.

articles.title: Wendy's opens restaurant in Mega Mall Bucharest
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: Wendy's opened a new restaurant in Bucharest, Romania, marking its second location in the country. The launch included a limited-edition Romanian-themed logo on packaging and sourcing 100% fresh, Romanian beef and chicken. This signifies Wendy's commitment to the Romanian market and localized offerings.

articles.title: 10 Sweet, Practical Gifts First-Time Moms Will Actually Use
articles.author: Jennifer Ford
articles.summary: The article highlights several products ideal as gifts for new mothers. Hatch Restore 3 Sunrise Clock, designed to promote better sleep through personalized sleep routines. The Calpak Weekender Duffel, functions as a hospital bag and travel duffel. O.P.I press-ons, offer a salon-quality manicure at home.

articles.title: Burger King debuts a bold new Whopper
articles.author: Colette Bennett
articles.summary: Burger King launched the Whopper in 1957. The Whopper originally sold for 37 cents.

articles.title: Burger King debuts a bold new Whopper
articles.author: Colette Bennett
articles.summary: Burger King Japan launched the Smoky BBQ Whopper on April 21, featuring Bulls Eye BBQ sauce, priced at 670 yen. They also introduced the Creamy Mexican Avocado Whopper on April 11, containing a 12-spice creamy Mexican sauce and avocado, costing 970 yen for the sandwich.

articles.title: ଆସିଗଲା ତାରିଖ; ଏପ୍ରିଲ 30ରେ ଲଞ୍ଚ ହେବ Motorola Edge 60 Pro ସ୍ମାର୍ଟଫୋନ
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Motorola will launch the Motorola Edge 60 Pro in the Indian market on April 30th. The smartphone features a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset, a 50MP triple rear camera, a 1.5K quad-curved display, and a 6000mAh battery and will be available in Shadow, Dazzling Blue, and Sparkling Grape color options.

articles.title: Gluten- and dairy-free ice cream parlor opens in former Old Town Starbucks space
articles.author: Erin Udell
articles.summary: Edison's Ice Cream opened a new shop on April 23, 2024, in Old Town Fort Collins, offering dairy- and gluten-free ice cream. The shop features signature flavors like lemon bar, strawberry shortcake, mint Oreo, and salted honey, utilizing a coconut cream base for dairy-free options. In addition to scoops, Edison's Ice Cream also sells ice cream sandwiches and to-go ice cream.

articles.title: Gluten- and dairy-free ice cream parlor opens in former Old Town Starbucks space
articles.author: Erin Udell
articles.summary: Edison's Ice Cream opened on April 23, 2024, offering dairy- and gluten-free ice cream flavors like lemon bar, strawberry shortcake, and salted honey. The shop, located at 172 N. College Ave., also sells ice cream sandwiches and to-go ice cream.

articles.title: Bill Gates' daughter follows in his footsteps to launch a... fashion platform?
articles.summary: Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni launched 'Phia' on April 24, a web browser/app designed to be a booking.com for fashion. Phia offers instant price comparison from thousands of e-commerce sites for fashion items, both new and used, aiming to help users find the best deals and assess the value of items on the secondary market.

articles.title: Key Steps to Launch a Profitable Soap Making Business
articles.author: wax paper
articles.summary: The article suggests that soap producers should consider packaging options like rustic kraft paper wraps, custom-printed boxes, clear biodegradable wraps, and reusable fabric pouches to enhance brand image and appeal to customers. To effectively market soaps, the article suggests selling at local markets, leveraging social media, gathering customer reviews, and collaborating with influencers.

articles.title: Henry cordless vacuum cleaner that outlasts Dyson and Shark is now 37% off
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Henry has launched the cordless Henry Quick Hen 100 vacuum cleaner, priced at £189.05 on Amazon, boasting a smart pod system and up to 60 minutes of cordless cleaning. Customer reviews praise its suction power, battery life, and lightweight design, with comparisons to Dyson and Shark models.

articles.title: I'm a former Thiel fellow who dropped out of college. I now run a $1.3 billion logistics company.
articles.author: lvaranasi@businessinsider.com
articles.summary: Stord launched a commerce enablement platform to enhance the shipping experience for brands and consumers. The platform aims to level the e-commerce field by offering features such as delivery promises and shipping insurance. Stord operates with an orchestration layer of software managing a physical fulfillment network.

articles.title: 59 Things To Help You Feel A Bit More Put Together This Year
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of new products, including an electric fabric defuzzer, an Iron Out rust stain remover, and a nongreasy eye cream.  Additionally, it features a car air freshener reed diffuser by Amber and Wood Co., and a vacuum cleaner designed for cars. Several other products are featured with customer reviews, ranging from home and kitchen organizers to cosmetic solutions.

articles.title: Baidu Launches ERNIE 4.5 Turbo, ERNIE X1 Turbo and New AI Tools for Developers To Boost Innovation at Baidu Create 2025 in China
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Baidu launched ERNIE 4.5 Turbo and ERNIE X1 Turbo, along with a new suite of AI tools, at Baidu Create 2025 on April 25, 2025. These new AI models and tools are designed to empower developers and supercharge AI innovation. The company aims to help developers embrace MCP (Model Context Protocol).

articles.title: Generational Group Advises Denmark Sausage Co. in its Sale to Premium Brands Holdings Corporation
articles.summary: Premium Brands acquired Denmark Sausage Co. (Denmark Foods/Arizona Fresh) on March 3, 2025. Denmark Sausage Co., located in Peoria, Arizona, is a leading provider of fresh sausages and meats to grocers and food service companies across Arizona.

articles.title: Insta360 X5 is Smarter and Tougher, Check Out All the Key Features
articles.author: Nbsp
articles.summary: Insta360 has launched its new flagship action camera, the Insta360 X5, which features an improved 1/1.28″ sensor, 8K 360° video at 30fps, and enhanced durability. The Insta360 X5 is priced at HKD 4,099.

articles.title: Wayfair Way Day 2025: The tips to maximize savings during sale
articles.author: Francisco Bernard
articles.summary: Wayfair launched its annual Way Day sales event, featuring discounts across brands like Blackstone, Samsung, Keurig, Serta, and Bissell. A new 'Wayfair Verified' program highlights trusted products evaluated by Wayfair specialists to ensure quality and value. The event extends to other online retailers within Wayfair's family of brands, including AllModern, Birch Lane, and Joss & Main.

articles.title: Wayfair Way Day 2025: The tips to maximize savings during sale
articles.author: Francisco Bernard
articles.summary: Wayfair launched its Way Day sales event, offering exceptional savings across brands like Blackstone, Samsung, Keurig, Serta, and Bissell. They are also introducing a new feature called 'Wayfair Verified' that highlights the best items in the Wayfair catalog. Wayfair's Way Day deals also extend to other brands such as AllModern, Birch Lane and Joss & Main.

articles.title: 17 can't-miss Wayfair sale kitchen and appliance deals, per a private chef
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering significant deals on kitchen and appliance products, including a nugget ice maker (Opal 2.0) with Bluetooth connectivity, a portable pizza oven with a 15" cordierite stone, a stainless steel wine and beverage cooler, and a professional-grade maple cutting board. Other products like espresso makers, juicers, dinnerware sets, and outdoor stoves are also highlighted for their design, functionality, and performance.

articles.title: LG confirms game-changing upgrade for these TVs - is your model on the list?
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: LG has launched the Xbox app on its latest TVs running webOS 24. This allows users to access and stream Xbox games directly on their LG TVs via Xbox Game Pass Ultimate without needing an Xbox console.

articles.title: Review: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE+
articles.author: Daniel Smith
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Tab S10 FE+, a new tablet with a 13.1-inch screen, long battery life, and a price starting at £649. Customers purchasing the tablet before May 13 will receive a free Slim Keyboard Cover. A trade-in offer is also available, providing a guaranteed £100 discount for any tablet or Android smartphone trade-in.

articles.title: Adobe Firefly now supports partner AI models, moodboards, and enterprise APIs
articles.author: Bob O'Donnell
articles.summary: Adobe launched a new web-based Firefly application and will be launching iOS and Android versions soon. The Firefly application now integrates image creation tools from other GenAI models, including Google and OpenAI. This allows Firefly to create images using copyrighted material, which was previously impossible.

articles.title: Big price drops alert: LG washing machines now more affordable with new offers, starting at just ₹10341
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: LG has announced price drops and offers on its range of washing machines, including top-load, front-load, and semi-automatic models. These offers include bank discounts, cashback, and exchange programs, reducing the effective price of models like the 7 kg Smart Inverter Washing Machine to around ₹ 11,719 and the 9 kg Front Load Washing Machine to around ₹ 29,255.

articles.title: Big price drops alert: LG washing machines now more affordable with new offers, starting at just  ₹10341
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: LG has announced price drops and offers on a range of washing machines. These include top load, front load, and semi-automatic models featuring Smart Inverter Technology and TurboDrum. Discounts, cashback, and exchange offers are available, significantly reducing the effective prices of models like the 7 kg Smart Inverter, 8 kg Smart Inverter, 7 kg Semi-Automatic, 9 kg Front Load, and 8.5 kg Semi-Automatic washing machines.

articles.title: My shopping was cheaper than Aldi with supermarket's bulk buys
articles.author: Emma Gill
articles.summary: Lidl introduced 'super sized week' promotion in stores from April 24, offering larger product sizes at competitive prices. A giant 32-pack of omega 3 Birds Eye Fish Fingers was available for £3.99, and a 1.4kg bag of McCain French Fries was offered for £3.49.

articles.title: White Stuff's new summer collection includes 'stretchy' jumpsuit ideal for warmer days
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: White Stuff has launched its new summer collection featuring the Lorna Linen Blend Maxi Dress (£99), a linen blend jumpsuit (£95), and the Sophie Organic Cotton Shirt (£49). The collection aims to provide easy-to-wear and stylish options for the warmer season, with pieces suitable for various occasions.

articles.title: Amazon slashes 22% off 'powerful' and 'quick' NutriBullet smoothie maker
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the NutriBullet Magic Bullet Large Capacity Jug Blender & Smoothie Maker from £49.99 to £39. The NutriBullet Magic Bullet has a 600-Watt power base and a large 1.5L capacity blender.

articles.title: How Lagos-native innovators are revolutionising Nigerias tea industry
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: TeaStoria, co-founded by Raliat Akinlolu, Saula Akinlolu, Ayosumbo Newton, and Omololu Newton, is revolutionizing Nigeria's tea culture. The company is the country's leading Ready-To-Drink (RTD) tea brand, redefining how Nigerians consume tea.

articles.title: Toyota Nigeria Holds 2nd Exclusive Motor Show in Lekki Lagos
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Toyota is planning an exclusive motor show to allow existing, new, and prospective customers to experience various Toyota vehicle models.

articles.title: Victoria's Secret's new £35 crinkle swimsuit is similar to a £175 designer version
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret has launched a new crinkle swimsuit collection, offering a more affordable alternative to designer brands. The collection includes the Dream On Blue Crinkle Bikini, made from textured scrunch fabric and priced at £53, as well as a one-piece swimsuit in the same style.

articles.title: Victoria's Secret's new £35 crinkle swimsuit is similar to a £175 designer version
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret has launched a new crinkle swimsuit range as a more affordable alternative to designer brands. The collection includes a bikini top and bottoms made from ultra-stretchy textured scrunch fabric, along with a one-piece swimsuit. The crinkle style is available in various colors and bottom styles, offering a designer swimwear look at a lower price point.

articles.title: Why Dyson Founder Says He Has Lived a ‘Life of Failure'
articles.author: MacKenzie Coffman and
articles.summary: James Dyson, while developing the Ballbarrow, created his bagless vacuum cleaner. The cyclonic technology used in the vacuum cleaner then led Dyson into a variety of other product categories.

articles.title: Why Dyson Founder Says He Has Lived a ‘Life of Failure'
articles.author: MacKenzie Coffman
articles.summary: Dyson initially developed the Ballbarrow and then created the bagless vacuum using cyclonic technology. Dyson later abandoned its electric car project due to commercial viability concerns, which now sits in the company's global headquarters in Singapore.

articles.title: New Boox Go Series tablets may be the reMarkable alternative you've been waiting for
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Boox announced the launch of two new E Ink tablets: the Go 7 and the Go Color 7 Gen II.

articles.title: Primark's 'stunning' £16 colourful dress has shoppers 'running' to stores
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark launched its new Slinky Midaxi Dress, available in blue or gold, priced at £16, and ranging in sizes from XXS to XL. The dress is made from jersey fabric, features ruching at the waist, and is available for purchase online for Click and Collect or in Primark stores.

articles.title: Primark shoppers 'run' to find 'stunning' and 'gorgeous' £16 dress
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark has introduced its new Slinky Midaxi Dress, priced at £16, available in blue or gold (size XXS to XL). The dress features a sleeveless silhouette, comfortable jersey fabric and ruching to either side of the waist. The product can be purchased in-store or online via Click and Collect.

articles.title: I'm a used car expert, and this is the 'budget-friendly' and 'highly capable' motor I'll be buying this spring
articles.author: Lawrie Jones
articles.summary: The article discusses the MG ZS, highlighting its affordability and suitability as a family car. It introduces the MG ZS 115kW Trophy Connect EV Long-Range model, emphasizing its electric capabilities, 273-mile range, and features like a panoramic sky roof and heated seats.

articles.title: Primark shoppers 'running' to stores for 'stunning' £16 midaxi dress
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark is launching its new "Slinky Midaxi Dress", a £16 jersey dress available in blue or gold, sizes XXS to XL. The dress features a sleeveless silhouette, ruching at the waist and is available for purchase online via Click and Collect, or in stores.

articles.title: World's Biggest Zipper Maker Is Developing a Self-Propelled Zipper
articles.summary: YKK, the world's largest zipper maker, has unveiled a prototype self-propelled zipper. This indicates YKK is innovating with new zipper technology.

articles.title: Wahl Magic Clip Review: My Honest Opinion After One Year of Testing
articles.author: Sean Zucker
articles.summary: The Wahl Professional 5 Star Magic Clip is presented as a versatile and powerful hair clipper suitable for both beginners and experienced users. It highlights the product's ability to handle thick hair and its intuitive design, making it a functional tool for various haircuts.

articles.title: 'These M&S sandals are so comfy I wore them for 12 hours at a wedding'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer is offering 'Wide Fit Ankle Strap Block Heel Sandals' for £49.50 in platinum, tan, and black. The sandals feature a low block heel, a secure buckle, and are available in sizes 3 to 8 with half sizes.

articles.title: Baidu ups the ante with the release of its latest AI models
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Baidu Inc unveiled its latest large language model Ernie 4.5 Turbo and new deep-thinking model Ernie X1 Turbo. These models have enhanced multimodal capacities, stronger reasoning and lower costs.

articles.title: Donovan Ezeiruaku SHATTERS Draft Expectations
articles.summary: WeAreIowa app is required to stream WeAreIowa on phones. The WeAreIowa application allows users to stream content.

articles.title: Baidu Launches ERNIE 4.5 Turbo, ERNIE X1 Turbo and New Suite of AI Tools to Empower Developers and Supercharge AI Innovation  Apr. 26, 2025 01:03
articles.summary: Baidu introduced ERNIE 4.5 Turbo and ERNIE X1 Turbo, new AI models featuring enhanced multimodal capabilities and lower costs, during its Baidu Create 2025 event. Baidu also unveiled Xinxiang, a multi-agent collaboration app, and highly convincing digital humans, further expanding its suite of AI applications. The company is also enabling developers to utilize its services through the AI Open Initiative and Model Context Protocol (MCP).

articles.title: Shaka laka broom broom! NIDian's clean idea
articles.summary: Monish Nisha Bafna, a student at the National Institute of Design (NID), introduced the HP Broom, a redesigned broom intended to improve cleaning efficiency and user comfort. The HP Broom features reworked bristle density, spread, and shape for faster and more thorough cleaning, targeting compact homes and diverse users.

articles.title: Slate's Innovative Truck Has All the Right Buzzwords. But Will America Want It?
articles.author: Ben Bowers
articles.summary: Slate Auto, a new car company, officially introduced itself at an event in LA. The company aims to offer a compelling alternative in the automotive market, with a focus on EVs and small pickups. The company's vision and product have generated excitement among automotive enthusiasts.

articles.title: 35 Products To Help You Avoid Those Tiny Problems That Threaten To Ruin Your Day
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products and services aimed at solving everyday problems. Highlights include the launch of 'Fearless' body and fabric tape for secure strapless dresses, 'Purse Gummy' nonslip grip stickers to prevent bag slippage, 'Lifeproof' protective spray for preventing stains on hard surfaces and 'GoGoHeel' heel stoppers to help walking on cobblestone streets. Additionally, the article mentions new iterations of items from established brands like Revlon with a volcanic stone face roller for oil control.

articles.title: Dubai to introduce robot delivery system soon
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Dubai will soon introduce robot delivery services. Yango is the company providing this new service.

articles.title: 50% OFF Recurring  Starting at 4.9/Year  cPanel/DirectAdmin  3 Locations
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: A company is offering 50% off recurring payments on SSD Web Hosting Packages with the code "50OFF". The Starter Package includes 5 GB SSD Storage, 0 Addon Domains, 0 Subdomains, and 1 Database.

articles.title: Why You Need To Know About The Model Context Protocol (MCP)
articles.author: David G.W. Birch
articles.summary: OpenAI and other companies are adopting the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to enhance their AI capabilities. Walmart plans to build agents that interact with consumers' agents using MCP to improve recommendations and product information exchange. This represents a new type of interaction between retailers and customers' agents, facilitating agentic commerce.

articles.title: Where to pre-order Switch 2 Mario Kart World bundle and accessories in the UK
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Pre-orders for the Nintendo Switch 2 are now available.

articles.title: Molly Sims talks YSE Beauty's new ‘universally flattering' lip tints: ‘Can't live without a good ...
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: YSE Beauty launched its new product, Like a Gloss Lip Tint, on Friday. The product is a colorful spin on a lip tint, catering to the brand's fans' feedback.

articles.title: Baidu hits the turbo button to get back into AI race
articles.author: Info World
articles.summary: Baidu upgraded its multimodal foundation model, ERNIE 4.5, and reasoning model, ERNIE X1. Enhanced multimodal capabilities, strong reasoning, and low costs are now available for users to access on Ernie Bot free of charge.
